install.description: Shows content only to specific subscribers. Usage: {akeebasubs SubscriptionsList}your content here{/akeebasubs} will show the content to subscribers of the subscriptions levels listed. You can define multiple subscriptions using the || (OR) and && (AND) operators. The AND operators are evaluated before OR operators, i.e. "SUB1 || SUB2 && SUB3" will show the content to users having a SUB1 subscription or to users having both SUB2 and SUB3.
